class.name: GetPolledImageRequest
class.comment: Namespace to publish response topics in. A polled camera driver node should publish: <response_namespace>/image_raw <response_namespace>/camera_info

field.name: response_namespace
field.comment: Timeout for attempting to capture data from the device. This does not include latency from ROS communication, post-processing of raw camera data, etc. A zero duration indicates no time limit.

field.name: timeout
field.comment: Binning settings, if supported by the camera.

field.name: binning_y
field.comment: Region of interest, if supported by the camera.

class.name: GetPolledImageResponse
class.comment: Namespace to publish response topics in. A polled camera driver node should publish: <response_namespace>/image_raw <response_namespace>/camera_info

field.name: status_message
field.comment: Error message in case of failure

field.name: stamp
field.comment: Timestamp of the captured image. Can be matched against incoming sensor_msgs/Image header.

class.name: GetPolledImage
class.comment: Namespace to publish response topics in. A polled camera driver node should publish: <response_namespace>/image_raw <response_namespace>/camera_info
